TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_bcilung, title = bcilung, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/bcilung} }

S.FORM: == bcilung == maki cka bcilung ga kyan 'cyux, kbolung ru kmalang. 'sya bcilung ga kmtux tnlaman hmali ta.
== bcilong == maki cka bcilong ga kyan 'cyox, kbolong ro kmalang. 'sya bcilong ga kmtox tnlaman hmali ta.
